cells.arabic: حِلْف  الرَّبّ  لِدَاوُدٍ   بِالْحَقّ  ولَم  يَنْدَم   وبإبنك  تَمّ  الْمَوْعُود   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: He saved Adam and his offspring: Form the fire of Hell: And returned him to his grace: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: خَلَص  آدَم  وَبُنِّيُّهُ   مِن  نَار  جَهَنَّم   وَرَدَدْتهُ  إِلَى  نَعِيم  كَان  فِيهُ   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: David is glad today: He rejoiced with us when: His psalms were fulfilled: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: دَاوُدٌ  الْيَوْم  مَسْرُور   فَرُح  مَعنَا  حِين  تَمّ   كِلَاَمهُ  فِي  الْمَزْمُور   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: That chosen pregnancy: To the prudent, a mystery: A plant without seed: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: ذَاك  الْحَبْل  الْمُخْتَار   اعجوبة  لمَن  يَفْهَم   كَزَرْع  بغَيْر  بُذَّار   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Abraham, head of the patriarchs: Rejoiced at the fulfillment: Of the oath the Lord promised: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: رَأْس  الْآبَاء  إبراهيم   فَرُح  لِتَمَام  قِسْم   مِن  الرَّبّ  لَه  قَدِيم   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Curse and shame were removed: From us for He had mercy: When He dwelt in our lady: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: زالت  اللَّعْنَة  وَالْعَار   عَنَا  وقَد  رَحِم   إذا  حَلّ  فِي  سَيِّدَة  الْأَبْكَار   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: A heaven you are and an example: To all who came before: And all those to come: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: سَمَاء  أَنْت  وَمِثَال   لجَمِيع  مِن  تَقَدُّم   وإِلَى  كُلّ  الْأَجْيَال   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Isaiah witnessed in truth: That the Son will incarnate: And will be born of you: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: شَهِد  بِالْحَقّ  أشعياء   إِنّ  الْاِبْن  يَتَجَسَّم   وَيُوَلِّد  مِنكَ  ازليا   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: The star became a sign: And guided the Magi: To the place of Emmanuel: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: صَار  النَّجْم  كَالْدَّليل   لِلْمَجُوس  وَتَقَدُّم   وَوَقْف  حَيْث  عمانوئيل   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: They saw the light of the star: Guiding them in the darkness: To Herod they confirmed the news: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: ضَوْء  النَّجْم  نَظَرُوهُ   وَأَرْشَدهُمْ  فى  الظَّلَام   ولهيرودس  حَقَّقُوهُ   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Herod, the deceiver thought: That Christ is an earthly king: He ordered to kill Him: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: طَلَب  الْمَكَّار  وَرِضَى   قَتَل  الْمَوْلُود  وَزَعْم   إِنّهُ  مَلِك  أَرْضِيّ   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: The wise men went forth: Offered gifts joyfully: Myrrh, gold, and frankincense: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: ظَفَر  بِه  الْفَرَسَانِ   وكُلّ  مِنهُمْ  قَدَم   الْمَرّ  وَالذَّهَب  وَاللُّبَّانِ   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: My mind is confused: My tongue can not speak: Unable to describe you: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: عَقْلِيٌّ  فِي  وَصَفكَ  حِيرَان   وانا  حَقَا  أَعِلْم   إنْي  عَاجِز  اللِّسَان   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: My mind is pondering: He who gave us life: How He fled to Mount Qosqam: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: غَاب  عَقْلِيٌّ  وَهَام   فِي  مِن  احيانا  بَعْد  عَدَم   كَيْف  هَرَب  لِجَبَل  قسقام   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: They bathed Him in Matareya: So the Balsam tree sprouted: From it we make Myroon (Holy Oil): Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: فِي  الْمَطَرِيَّة  حَمُوهُ   فَطَلَع  شَجِر  الْبَلْسَم   مِنهُ  الْمَيْرُون  صَنَعُوهُ   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Prophets spoke with the Spirit: About what was revealed: And in the Book explained: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: قَال  الآنبياء  بِالرَّوْح   لَمَّا  اوحى  وَأُلهُمْ   وَفَى  الْكِتَاب  مشروح   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: How many wonders: And miracles and mysteries: The prudent may wonder: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: كَم  لَك  مِن  أَعَاجِيب   ومِن  آيَات  عِظَام   تُحَيِّر  فِيهَا  اللَّبِيب   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Save for the Lord God: Who came and saved Adam: We would still be in captivity: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: لَوْلَا  الرَّبّ  الْإلَه   لِخُلَّاص  آدَم  تَقْديم   لِدُمْنَا  فِي  رِقّ  اعداه   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Moses received on Mount Sinai: The mount of the red sea: Two tablets from his Lord: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: مُوسَى  فِي  طَوْر  سِيَنّ   وَجَبَل  بَحْر  القلزم   اعطاه  رَبّهِ  لِوَحَيْن   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: You are like the Ten Commandments: Written without pen: And like the burning bush: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: نَظِير  الْعُشُر  الْكَلِمَات   كَتَبَت  بغَيْر  قَلَم   ورآك  عَوْسَج  بِثُبَّات   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Your Son saved: All nations and peoples: And led them to the truth: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: هَا  إبنك  قَد  نَجَّى   سَائِر  الشُّعُوب  وَالْأُمَم   وَالَى  اِلْحَق  أَهُدَى   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: The Lord revived us: When He came and suffered: From shame He redeemed us: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: وَالرَّبّ  قَد  احيان   حِين  جَانَا  وَتَأَلُّم   ومِن  الذُّلّ  فَدَّانا   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: Do not forget our Patriarch: Grant him abundant grace: And his partners our bishops: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: لَا  تَنْسَى  بَطْرَكُنَا   وَاِمْنِحهُ  وَافِر  النَّعَم   وَشُرَكَائه  أَسَاقِفَتنَا   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: O Lord protect us: We are Your people: and Your flock, Save us: Hail to you O Mary

cells.arabic: يَا  رُبّ  نُجِينَا   لأَنّنَا  شَعَّبكَ   وَغَنَم  رَعَيْتكَ  اِرْحَمنَا   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ

cells.english: And to the Lord of hosts: We cry Lord Have Mercy: Shouting with a loud voice: Hail to you O Mary ${cross}

cells.arabic: وإِلَى  رُبّ  الْقُوَّات   نصرخ  يَا  رُبّ  اِرْحَم   وَنَصِيح  بأعلا  الْأَصْوَات   السُّلَّام  لَك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ ${cross}

english_title: I Open My Mouth With Praise
arabic_title: أفتح فاى بالتسبيح

cells.english: I open my mouth with praise: And say with a broken heart: My Lord Jesus Christ: Grant me a praising tongue

cells.arabic: أَفَتْح  فاى  بِالتَّسْبِيح   وَأَقُول  بِقَلْب  جَرِيح   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   أعطنى  لِسَان  فَصِيح

cells.english: That I may praise Your Name: And thank You for Your grace: My Lord Jesus Christ: Teach me Your statutes

cells.arabic: لكى  أَسَبَّح  أَسَمَك   وَأَشْكُر  فَضْل  أَنَعَامكَ   ياربي  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   عَلِمنِي  أَحُكَّامكَ

cells.english: Holy is Your Name and wonderful: And glorified in Your saints: My Lord Jesus Christ: Have mercy on your creation

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  أَسْمكَ  وَعَجِيب   وَمُمَجِّد  فى  قِدِّيسِيُّكَ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِرْحَم  صَنْعَة  يَدِيكَ

cells.english: Worthy and right are You: To be praised and glorified: My Lord Jesus Christ: Your praise is sweet and good

cells.arabic: مُسْتَحِقّ  وَمُسْتَوْجِب   التَّسَابِيح  و  التماجيد   ياربي  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   تَسْبِيحكَ  حَلُو  وَلَذِيذ

cells.english: I cried unto You all day: I raised my hands to You: My Lord Jesus Christ: Your Name is sweet to me

cells.arabic: صرخت  بِطُول  النَّهَار   مديت  نَحْوكَ  يداى   ياربي  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   أَسْمكَ  حَلُو  عَنَدِيٌّ

cells.english: I cast my cares on You: O Lord, neglect me not: My Lord Jesus Christ: Do not forsake me

cells.arabic: جَعَلَت  اِتِّكَالِيٌّ  عَلَيْكَ   يارب  لَا  تُهْمِلنِي   يارب  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   لَا  تَتَخَلّ  عَنَى

cells.english: Your Holy Spirit: Cast not away from me: My Lord Jesus Christ: With Your might help me

cells.arabic: رَوَّحكَ  الْقُدُّوس   لَا  تَنْزِعهُ  مُنَى   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   بِمَعُونَتكَ  أشملنى

cells.english: The enemy has injured me: And has deeply wounded me: Give me Your Body as ointment: And Your Blood as bandage

cells.arabic: جرحنى  الْعَدُوّ  بِسِهَام   وَجَرَحهُ  فى  حَاق   أعطنى  جَسَّدكَ  مَرْهَم   وَدَمّكَ  لى  تِرْيَاق

cells.english: Seven times daily: Every day I praise Your Name: My Lord Jesus Christ: Make me of Your portion

cells.arabic: سَبْع  مَرَّات  كُلّ  يَوْم   كُلّ  يَوْم  أَبَارَك  أَسَمَك   ياربي  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِجْعَلنِي  مِن  قَسَّمكَ

cells.english: My soul has longed for You: As a barren land: My Lord Jesus Christ: In Your mercy, remember us

cells.arabic: اِشْتَاقَت  نُفْسَى  إِلَيْكَ   كَالْْأَرَض  الْعَطْشَانَة   ياربي  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   بِرَحْمَتكَ  لَا  تَنْسَانَا

cells.english: Do not forget our Church: Fill it with Your goodness: My Lord Jesus Christ: Establish it in Your laws

cells.arabic: لَا  تَنْسَى  بَيْعَتنَا   إملأها  مِن  خَيْرَاتكَ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   ثَبَّتهَا  بِشَهَادَاتكَ

cells.english: Your laws are sweet on my lips: As honey is sweet in my mouth: My Lord Jesus Christ: Cleanse me from my sins

cells.arabic: شَهَادَاتكَ  حلْوَة  فِي  حَلْقَى   كَالْشُّهَّد  دَاخِل  فَمِيٌّ   ياربي  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِغْسِلنِي  مِن  أَثَمِيٌّ

cells.english: We thank the Beneficent: And worship the Lord Jesus: Christ the Lord of hosts: We kneel to Him in awe

cells.arabic: نَشْكُر  صَانِع  الْخَيْرَات   نَسْجُد  لِلرَّبّ  يَسُوع   الْمَسِيح  رُبّ  الْقُوَّات   فَلَنُرْكِع  لَه  بِخُشُوع

cells.english: Impart Your laws in us: By Your words, confirm us: My Lord Jesus Christ: Raise the state of the church

cells.arabic: رَتَّب  فِينَا  أَحُكَّامكَ   وَبُقولكَ  ثَبَتْنَا   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِرْفَع  شَأْن  مُلْتنَا

cells.english: Raise the state of the Christians: In all the world: My Lord Jesus Christ: Embrace and support them

cells.arabic: اِرْفَع  شَأْن  الْمَسِيحِيِّينَ   فى  جَمِيع  الْمَسْكُونَة   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِشْمَلهُمْ  بِمَعُونَة

cells.english: If we live in poverty: Your Name shall sustain us: My Lord Jesus Christ: Your goodness shall enrich us

cells.arabic: وَان  كَنَّا  فَقَرَّاء  مِن  الْمَال   اُسْمكَ  هُو  يَكْفِينَا   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   وَصُلَاَّحكَ  يُغَنِّينَا

cells.english: Unto You is due praise: Unto You is due blessing: My Lord Jesus Christ: The Fountain of all goodness

cells.arabic: يَجِب  لَك  التَّسْبِيح   ينبغى  لَك  الْبَرَكَات   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   يَنْبُوع  كُلّ  الْخَيْرَات

cells.english: O Lord save Your people: And bless Your inheritance: Raise their state by Your Name: And grant them Your kingdom

cells.arabic: يارب  خَلَص  شَعَّبكَ   وَبَارَك  مِيرَاثكَ   اِرْفَع  شَأَنهُمْ  بَاسِمكَ   وَوَرِثهُمْ  مَلَكُوتكَ

cells.english: Your Kingdom O my God: Is an eternal Kingdom: And Your Lordship O my King: Is an everlasting Lordship

cells.arabic: مَلَكُوتكَ  يَا  إلهى   مَلَكُوت  أبَدِيَّة   وَسِيَادَتكَ  ياملكى   سِيَادَة  أَزَلِّيَّة

cells.english: Everlasting and exalted: And wonderful are Your deeds: My Lord Jesus Christ: The Master of all kingdoms

cells.arabic: أَزَلِّيَّة  وَمُرْتَفِعَة   وَعَجِيبَة  هى  أَفَعَالِك   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   سَيِّد  كُلّ  ممالك

cells.english: Worldly kingdoms perish: And all money is fleeting: My Lord Jesus Christ: Your Kingship is everlasting

cells.arabic: ممالك  الدُّنْيَا  تُزَوِّل   وَالْمَال  كُلّهُ  فانى   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   مَلَككَ  غَيْر  متناهى

cells.english: All kingdoms will perish: And all worldly treasures: My Lord Jesus Christ: You’re the treasure of the poor

cells.arabic: تَتَنَاهَى  كُلّ  ممالك   تَفْنَى  كُنُوز  الْأُمَرَاء   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   أَنْت  كَنْز  الْفُقَرَاء

cells.english: The poor make them rich: And heal the sick: Raise the orphans: O Lord enrich them

cells.arabic: فَقَرَّاء  شَعَّبكَ  اغنيهم   وَالْمَرْضَى  أَشْفِيهُمْ   والايتام  رَبِّيهُمْ   مِن  فَضَّلكَ  أُغَنِّيهُمْ

cells.english: O please enrich them: And aid those who are in debt: My Lord Jesus Christ: You're the Treasure of the poor

cells.arabic: أُغَنِّيهُمْ  مِن  فَضَّلكَ   أَوْف  عَن  الْمَدْيُونِينَ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   أَنْت  غَنَّى  الْمُحْتَاجِينَ

cells.english: If we're ever in need: We have a precious Gem: We have the precious stone: Jesus the Precious One

cells.arabic: ان  كَنَّا  مُحْتَاجِينَ   فلَنَا  دُرَّة  ثَمينَة   لَنَا  الْحَجَر  الْكَرِيم   يَسُوع  غَالَى  الْقِيمَة

cells.english: Precious and honored: More than the world indeed: His Name is Jesus Christ: The Forgiver of all sins

cells.arabic: غَال  الْقِيمَة  وَكَرِيم   أَغْلَى  مِن  الدُّنْيَا  تَمَام   إسمه  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   الْغَافِر  كُلّ  آثَام

cells.english: The Forgiver of all sins: Who hearkens to those who plead: All the nations confess Him: And the kings praise Him

cells.arabic: غَافِر  كُلّ  الذُّنُوب   سَامِع  لمَن  يَدْعُوهُ   تَعْتَرِف  لَه  كُلّ  الشُّعُوب   وَالْمُلُوك  يُسَبِّحُوهُ

cells.english: Praise Him O you nations: Glorify Him all people: My Lord Jesus Christ: Grant us to do Your will

cells.arabic: سَبَّحُوهُ  ياكل  الامم   مَجَدُوهُ  ياكل  الشُّعُوب   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   تَبْلُغنَا  الْمَطْلُوب

cells.english: Our plea is Your Kingdom: And Your never-ending mercy: My Lord Jesus Christ: Your nature is goodness

cells.arabic: مَطْلُوبنَا  مَلَكُوتكَ   وَمَرَاحِمكَ  مَوْجُودهُ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   يَامِن  طَبَعهُ  الجوده

cells.english: You are good and generous: There is no other like You: My Lord Jesus Christ: You are all-observing

cells.arabic: صَاحِب  جَوَّدهُ  وَكَرِيم   ولَيْس  لَه  قَطّ  نَظِير   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   أَنْت  عَلَى  الْكَلّ  بَصير

cells.english: All-observing and watching us: According to Your plan: My Lord Jesus Christ: Let us only rely on You

cells.arabic: بَصير  وَمُتَطَلِّع   عَلَيْنَا  بِتَدَابِيركَ   يَا  رَبَّى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   لَا  تُحْوِجنَا  لغَيْركَ

cells.english: We know no other but You: In Your Gospel, we trust: You are the Son of God: Confirm us in Your faith

cells.arabic: لَا  نَعْرُف  غَيْركَ  اُلْه   بِإِنْجيلكَ  صَدَّقنَا   أَنْت  هُو  إبن  الله   فى  ايمانك  ثَبَتْنَا

cells.english: Confirm us in the faith: Raise us from idleness: My Lord Jesus Christ: We rejoice in Your name

cells.arabic: ثَبَتْنَا  عَلَى  الْأَيْمَان   وَاِنْهَضنَا  مِن  كُلّ  مَلَل   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   بَاسِمكَ  نَتَهَلَّل

cells.english: We rejoice with hymn: We sing with the psaltery: My Lord Jesus Christ: Your praise is joy and delight

cells.arabic: نَتَهَلَّل  بالالحان   وَنُرَتِّل  بِالْمَزْمُور   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   تَسْبِيحكَ  بَهِجَة  وَسُرُور

cells.english: Our joy is in Your praise: Our splendor is in Your glory: My Lord Jesus Christ: To You is due all glory

cells.arabic: سُرُورنَا  تَسَابِيحكَ   بَهَجَتنَا  هُو  مَجَدكَ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   الْعَظْمَة  لَك  وَحَدّكَ

cells.english: I have sinned against You: And have transgressed Your law: You are justified in Your words: And prevail when you judge

cells.arabic: لَك  وَحَدّكَ  انا  اخطيت   وَصَنَعَت  الشَّرّ  أَمَامكَ   لِتُصَدِّق  فى  أَقَوَّالكَ   وَتَغَلَّب  فى  أَحُكَّامكَ

cells.english: Your judgments are true and just: And your mercy is never-ending: My Lord Jesus Christ: Have mercy on my soul

cells.arabic: أَحُكَّامكَ  حَقّ  وَعَدْل   وَمَرَاحِمكَ  مُتَّسَعَة   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِرْحَم  نُفْسَى  المتضعة

cells.english: I humbled myself before Your glory: And depended on Your words: My Lord Jesus Christ: Cast me not on Your left-hand

cells.arabic: اتضعت  أَمَام  مَجَدكَ   وإتكلت  عَلَى  أَقَوَّالكَ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   لَا  تطرحنى  عَلَى  شَمَالكَ

cells.english: On Your left-hand cast me not: With the evil people: I ask You to accept me: As You accepted the tax collector

cells.arabic: عَلَى  شَمَالكَ  لَا  توقفنى   مَع  الْقَوْم  الاشرار   اِسْأَلكَ  أَنّ  تقبلنى   كَمَا  قَبِلَت  الْعِشَار

cells.english: I cry as the tax collector: With a broken heart: O Lord forgive my sins: For Your servant is a sinner

cells.arabic: أصرخ  بَصَوْت  الْعِشَار   وأَنَا  بِوَجْه  مطاطى   اللَّهُمّ  أَغَفَر  لى  الاوزار   فإنى  عَبَّدكَ  خَاطِئ

cells.english: The sin is in my nature: But Your nature is goodness: There is no slave without sin: Nor a Master without forgiveness

cells.arabic: الْخُطِّيَّة  مِن  طبعى   وَاُنْت  طَبَعكَ  الاحسان   لَيْس  عَبْد  بِلَا  خُطِّيَّة   ولَا  سَيِّد  بِلَا  غُفْرَان

cells.english: Forgiveness is of You: And mercy comes from You: My Lord Jesus Christ: Guide me towards your ways

cells.arabic: الْغُفْرَان  مِن  عِنْدكَ   وَالرَّحْمَة  هى  مِن  قَبِلكَ   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اهدينى  الى  سَبَّلكَ

cells.english: Your ways are lost from me: And life has passed me by: I ask You to accept me: And give me repentance

cells.arabic: سَبَّلكَ  تَاهَت  عَنَى   وَالْعُمَر  فَرَّغ  مُنَى   أَسَأَلكَ  تقبلنى   وَالتَّوْبَة  أعطينى

cells.english: Give me repentance and forgiveness: And cleanse me from my flaws: My Lord Jesus Christ: Forgive all my sins

cells.arabic: أعطينى  تَوْبَة  وَغُفْرَان   ونقينى  مِن  كُلّ  عيوبى   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِغْفِر  لى  كُلّ  ذنوبى

cells.english: My sins weigh upon me: As a heavy harsh burden: My Lord Jesus Christ: Purify all my senses

cells.arabic: ذنوبى  ثَقُلَت  فَوْق  راسى   كَحَمْل  ثَقِيل  قَاسَى   ياربى  يَسُوع  الْمَسِيح   اِشْف  كُلّ  حواسى

cells.english: Your mercies O my God: Are greatly plenteous: Your mercies O my God: Are countless

cells.arabic: مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   هى  كَثِيرَة  جِدّا   مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   لَا  يَحْصَى  لَهَا  عَدَّدَا

cells.english: Your mercies O my God: Are more than the plants of the earth: Your mercies O my God: Are beyond measure

cells.arabic: مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   أَكْثَر  مِن  نَبَات  الْأَرَض   مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   قَد  فَاقَت  كُلّ  عَدَد

cells.english: Your mercies O my God: Are as the rain drops: Your mercies O my God: Are more than the sand of the sea

cells.arabic: مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   كَقَطَرَات  الْأَمْطَار   مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   أَكْثَر  مِن  رَمْل  الْبَحَّار

cells.english: Your mercies O my God: Are as water fountains: Your mercies O my God: Are as flowing rivers

cells.arabic: مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   كَيَنَابِيع  الْمِيَاه   مَرَاحِمكَ  يَا  الهى   كَالْْأَنْهَار  الْجَارِيَة

cells.english: Have mercy on my soul: O Lord save me: O Lord blot out my sins: With Your goodness remember me

cells.arabic: يارب  اِرْحَم  نُفْسَى   يارب  خَلَّصنِي   يارب  اُمْح  إِثْمِيٌّ   بِصُلَاَّحكَ  اُذْكُرنِي

cells.english: Holy, Holy, Holy: God the Lord of Sabaoth: The Creator of the universe: And its Provider

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ   الله  رُبّ  الصاباؤوت   الْخَالِق  كُلّ  نُفُوس   وَرَازِقهُمْ  بِالْقُوت

cells.english: We ask You O Our King: Preserve the life of our Patriarch: And the bishops his companions: Amen Alleluia ${cross}

cells.arabic: نَسْأَلكَ  ياملكنا   أَدَم  رئاسة  بَطْرَكُنَا   وَشُرَكَاؤهُ  مَطَارِنَتنَا   امين  الليلويا ${cross}

english_title: Sunday Theotokia - 1st Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير الأول

cells.english: I start in the Name of God / Who dwells in light / Who spoke to Moses / Upon Mount Tabor

cells.arabic: أَبَدَأ  بَاسِم  الله /  السَّاكِن  فى  النُّور /  الذى  كَلَّم  مُوسَى /  مِن  فَوْق  جَبَل  الطَّوْر

cells.english: Saying O Moses / Arise joyfully / I will show you a place / Prophesied about

cells.arabic: قَائِلَا  يَا  مُوسَى /  اِنْهَض  فَرِحَا  مَسْرُورَا /  لِأَعْلَمكَ  بِمَا  كَان /  كَمَا  عَنهُ  تنبأون

cells.english: Arise O Moses / And ascend to the highest mount / Upon it build a dome / To resemble a tabernacle

cells.arabic: اِنْهَض  يَا  مُوسَى /  وَاِصْعَد  إِلَى  اعلى  الْجِبَال /  واِبْن  هُنَاك  قُبَّة /  تَكَوَّن  لَك  شَبَّة  مَظَالّ

cells.english: And all I say to you / Immediately write down / This is a testimony / For the Israelites

cells.arabic: وجَمِيع  مَا  قُلْتهُ  لَك /  اُكْتُبهُ  فى  الْحَال /  هَذِه  هى  شَهَادَة /  للإسرائيليين

cells.english: Hasten, O Moses / And observe the place / Build there a dome / With granite stone

cells.arabic: إسرع  ياموسى /  اُنْظُر  هَذَا  اُلْمُكَانّ /  واِبْن  فِيهُ  قُبَّة /  بِالْحَجَر  اُلْصُوَانّ

cells.english: Elevate its height / Give it four corners / Gather what is needed / For the builders

cells.arabic: وعَلَى  شَوَارِعهَا /  وَاِعْمَل  لَهَا  أَرْبَعَة  أَرْكَان /  وَاِجْمَع  مايحتاج /  إِلَيْهُ  الْبَنَّاؤُونَ

cells.english: Make the outside of the dome / And widen its hallway / Overlay it, O Moses / With pure gold

cells.arabic: وَاِعْمَل  خَارِج  الْقُبَّة /  فُسْحَة  كَالْدِّهْليز /  وَاِطْلِيهَا  ياموسى /  بِالذَّهَب  الْإبْرِيز

cells.english: Within and without / Honor for consecration / From the height to the base / With the precious gold

cells.arabic: دَاخِل  مَع  خَارِج /  كَرَامَة  لِلتَّكْريس /  مِن  أعَلَى  إِلَى  أَسْفَل /  بِالذَّهَب  الْمَوْزُون

cells.english: Make the inside of the dome / An altar for the showbread / And around the altar / Make four pillars

cells.arabic: وَاِعْمَل  دَاخِل  الْقُبَّة /  مَذْبَح  لِلْقُرْبَانِ /  وَاِعْمَل  حَوْل  الْمَذْبَح /  أَرْبَعَة  عَمْدَانِ

cells.english: Make there upon it / Cherubs made out of gold / With their wings spread / Upon the cover

cells.arabic: يَكْوُنّ  مِن  فَوْقهَا /  مِن  الذَّهَب  كاروبان /  بِأجْنِحَة  مَفْرُوشَة /  إيجين  بى  إيللاستيريون

cells.english: And in it place / The overlaid ark of covenant / And in it the golden vessel / With the hidden manna

cells.arabic: وَاِجْعَل  فِيهَا /  تَابُوت  الْعَهْد  المطلى /  وفِيهُ  الْقِسْط  الذَّهَب /  بِالْمَنّ  المخفى

cells.english: And in it Aaron's censer / From the pure gold / And the tablets of the covenant / With Aaron's rod

cells.arabic: وفِيهُ  شُورَيَة  هَرَوْن /  مِن  الذَّهَب  الْمُصَفَّى /  وفِيهُ  لَوَّحَا  الْعَهْد /  مَع  عَصَاَة  هَارُونٌ

cells.english: And in it the lampstand / With the chosen gold / And the golden vessel / Burning as the ember

cells.arabic: وفِيهُ  الْمَنَارَة /  مِن  الذَّهَب  الْمُخْتَار /  وفِيهُ  المايدة  ذَهَب /  تُشْعِل  كَجَمْر  النَّار

cells.english: Decorate it, O Moses / With various lights / Make also in it / Seven burning candles ${cross}

cells.arabic: وَزَيَّنهَا  ياموسى /  بِسَائِر  كُلّ  الْأَنْوَار /  وَاِجْعَل  فِيهَا  أَيْضا /  سَبْعَة  سَرْج  يُنِيرُون ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary / O you full of grace / Who are engulfed in light / O mother of the Merciful

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم /  يامملوءة  نَعَمَة /  يامشتملة  بالانوار /  ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us / On judgment day / Your Son granted us salvation / O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا /  فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة /  باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص /  ياإبنة  صهيون

cells.english: Holy, Holy, Holy; a reading from the Gospel according to our teacher St. Luke [1: 46-50] the Evangelist. May his blessings be with us all. Amen.

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ   فَصِل  مِن  الْإِنْجيل  بحَسْب  لَوِقَا    )  الْبَشير   بَرَكَاتهُ  تَكَوَّن  مَعنَا   آمِين

cells.english: And Mary said, "My soul magnifies the Lord. And my spirit has rejoiced in God my Savior. For He has regarded the low estate of His handmaiden. For behold, from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed. For He that is mighty has done great things and Holy is His Name. And His mercy is on them that fear Him from generation to generation. And Glory be to God forever. Amen ${cross}

cells.arabic: فَقَالَت  مَرْيَمٌ  تُعْظِم  نُفْسَى  الرَّبّ   وَتَتَهَلَّل  روحى  بِالله  مخلصى  لأَنّهُ  نَظَر  إِلَى  تَوَاضُع  أَمَّتهُ   هُوَذَا  مُنْذ  الْآن  تعطينى  الطّوبَى   جَمِيع  الْأَجْيَال   صَنْع  بى  الْقُوَى  عَظَائِم   قَدُّوسٌ  اُسْمهُ  وَرَحِمَتهُ  إِلَى  جِيل  الْأَجْيَال  لِخَائِفِيُّهُ   وَالْمَجْد  لِلَهّ  دَائِمَا  أبَديا   آمِين  ${cross}

english_title: Sunday Theotokia – 2nd Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير الثانى

cells.english: The Lord said to Moses: In a loud voice to call him: Arise and build an ark for Me: And overlay it with gold

cells.arabic: قَال  الرَّبّ  لِمُوسَى   بَصَوْت  عَالَى  يُنَادِيهِ   قُم  إصنع  لى  تَابُوتا   وَبِالْذَّهَب  إطليه

cells.english: So therein may dwell My secrets: And also my covenant: From shittim wood: And overlaid with gold

cells.arabic: لِأَضَع  سَرَى  فِيهُ   وَأَجْعَل  عهدى  فِيهُ   مِن  خَشَب  لايسوس   وَبِالْذَّهَب  تُطِلُّون

cells.english: You were likened, O Mary: To the overlaid ark: And in it the golden vessel: With the rational manna

cells.arabic: تَشَبَّهَت  يامريم   بِتَابُوت  الْعَهْد  المطلى   وفِيهُ  الْقِسْط  ذَهَب   بِالْمَنّ  العقلى

cells.english: Your praise in my tongue: Is sweeter than honey: We offer praise to You: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: مَدِيحكَ  فى  فمى   أَحَلَى  مِن  الْعَسَل   نُقْرِئكَ  كُلّ  سُلَّام   ياابنة  صهيون

cells.english: O shining star: As a lit lamp: You held the Son of God: The Living Who is unseen

cells.arabic: يانجمة  تَضْوَى   كَمِصْبَاح  النُّور   حَمَلَت  إبن  الله   الحى  غَيْر  الْمَنْظُور

cells.english: He saved Adam: After the bondage: And returned him and his sons: Joyfully to Paradise

cells.arabic: وَأَنْقَذ  آدَم   بَعْد  أَنّ  كَان  مأسور   وعَاد  هُو  وَبِنَوْه   إِلَى  الْفِرْدَوْس  وهُم  فَرَحَوْن

cells.english: You enlightened the world: After it was in darkness: And you carried in your womb: The Son; The Logos of God

cells.arabic: نَوَّرَت  الْعَالَم   بَعْد  أَنّ  كَان  ظُلْمَة   وَحَمَلَت  فى  أَحَشَاكَ   إبن  اللة  الْكَلِمَة

cells.english: You are the ark: You are the wisdom: You are our strength: And the joy of the upright

cells.arabic: اُنْت  هى  التَّابُوت   اُنْت  هى  الْحُكْمَة   اُنْت  هى  قَوَّتنَا   وَفَرَح  الصِّدِّيقُونَ

cells.english: In due time: God desired and chose you: And sent unto you the Logos: With the Holy Spirit in you

cells.arabic: لَمَّا  أَرَاد  الله   وَشَّاء  وَاِخْتَاركَ   وَأَرْسَل  إِلَيْكَ  الْكَلِمَة   بِرَوْح  قَدَّسهُ  زَانكَ

cells.english: You held in your womb: The Lord your God: You nourished Him with your milk: Like the rest of the humans

cells.arabic: وَحَمَلَت  فى  أَحَشَاكَ   الرَّبّ  إلَهكَ   ولدتيه  وَرَضَع  لِبَنْك   كَسَائِر  الْبَشَرِيِّينَ

cells.english: Ezekiel prophesied: In a vision and said: I saw an eastern door: Closed at all sides

cells.arabic: حِزْقِيَالٌ  تَنِبَّا   فى  رُؤْيَاهُ  وَقَال   رَأَيْت  بَابَا  فى  الْمَشْرِق   مقفولا  بِالْأَقْفَال

cells.english: Therein entered and came forth: The Most High King: And no harm came to it: And it was continuously sealed.

cells.arabic: دَخَل  فِيهُ  وَخَرَج   الْمَلِك  المتعال   ولَم  يَمَسّهُ  ضَرَر   وَبِحَاله  مَخْتُومَيْنِ

cells.english: Many witnessed of you: In prophecies and proverbs: He shall come forth from you: The exalted Lord

cells.arabic: وكَم  شَهِدُوا  عَنكَ   فى  نُبُوَّات  وَأَمْثَال   سَوْف  يَظْهَر  مِنكَ   الرَّبّ  المتعال

cells.english: He shall save His people: At the end of days: Your Son granted us salvation: O censer of Aaron ${cross}

cells.arabic: وَيَخْلُص  شَعَّبهُ   فى  آخِر  الْأَجْيَال   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْغُفْرَان   ياشورية  هَارُونٌ ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O you full of grace: Who are engulfed in light: O mother of the Merciful

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يامشتملة  بالانوار   ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us: On judgment day: Your Son granted us salvation: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا   فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   ياإبنة  صهيون

cells.english: Holy, Holy, Holy; a reading from the Gospel according to our teacher St. Luke [1: 51-55] the Evangelist. May his blessings be with us all. Amen.

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ   فَصِل  مِن  الانجيل  بحَسْب  لَوِقَا    )  الْبَشير   بَرَكَاتهُ  تَكَوَّن  مَعنَا   آمِين

cells.english: He has shown strength with His arm; He has scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts. He has put down the mighty from their thrones and exalted the lowly. He has filled the hungry with good things and the rich He has sent away empty. He has helped His servant Israel, In remembrance of His mercy, As He spoke to our fathers, To Abraham and to his seed forever." And Glory be to God forever. Amen ${cross}

cells.arabic: صَنْع  قُوَّة  بِذِرَاعه   وَفَرْق  الْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ  بِفِكْر  قَلُوبهُمْ   أَنْزَل  الْأَقْوِيَاء  عَن  الكراسى   وَرَفْع  الْمُتَوَاضِعِينَ  أَشْبَع  الْجِيَاع  مِن  الْخَيْرَات   وَأَرْسَل  الْأَغْنِيَاء  فَارِغَيْنِ   عَضُد  إسرائيل  فَتَاه ‘  وَذَكَر  رَحْمَة  كَمَا  قَال  لِآبَائنَا  إبراهيم  وَزَرَعهُ  إِلَى  الْأبَد   وَالْمَجْد  لِلَهّ  دَائِمَا  أَبْدَيَا  آمِين ${cross}

english_title: Sunday Theotokia – 3rd Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير الثالث

cells.english: O Mary, you became: An altar for forgiveness: And on it the golden gifts: In it the Body as showbread.

cells.arabic: يامريم  صُرْت   مَذْبَح  لِلْغُفْرَان   وعَلَيْهُ  المايدة  ذَهَب   وفِيهُ  الْجَسَد  قُرْبَان

cells.english: It was the Son of the Living God: Who gives forgiveness: To every pure person: Who lives in the paradise of Joy

cells.arabic: هُو  إبن  الله  الحى   الْمُعْطَى  الْغُفْرَان   لكُلّ  نَقَّى  طَاهِر   يُسَكِّن  نَعِيم  الْفِرْدَوْس

cells.english: You are the high altar: Who is engulfed in Light: And Its Light shines brightly: And fills all the earth

cells.arabic: أَنْت  هى  الْمَذْبَح   العالى  الْمُشْتَمِلَة  بِالْأَنْوَار   وَنَوَّرهُ  يَتَلَأْلَأ   مَلَأ  كُلّ  الاقطار

cells.english: Your light, O Mary: Exceeds the sun and the moon: You're higher than all ranks: And all the hosts

cells.arabic: وَضَوِّئكَ  يامريم   فَاق  كُلّ  شَمُوس  وَأَقْمَار   فُقْت  كُلّ  مَرَاتِب   وَسَائِر  كُلّ  طُقُوس

cells.english: You exceeded the elders: And the four beasts: And also the thrones: The principalities and the powers

cells.arabic: فُقْت  الرُّؤَسَاء   وَالْأَرْبَعَة  الْحَيَوَانَات   وأَيْضا  الكراسى   وَالْأرْبَاب  وَالْقُوَّات

cells.english: You held the Son of God: The Creator of all things: The Life Giver: To every body and soul

cells.arabic: حَمَلَت  اِبْن  الله   خَالِق  كُلّ  الْمَخْلُوقَات   مُعْطَى  كُلّ  حَيَاة   لكُلّ  جَسَد  وَنُفُوس

cells.english: O flower of incense: The aroma of your incense spread: O star that shines: That shines as a lamp

cells.arabic: يازهرة  الأطياب   بُخُوركَ  عَنْبَر  فَاح   يانجمة  تَضْوَى   تُضِئ  كَالْْمِصْبَاح

cells.english: O you full of grace: O you who are our joy: Your Son granted us salvation: And the Paradise of Joy

cells.arabic: يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يابدء  الافراح   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   وَنَعِيم  الْفِرْدَوْس

cells.english: Daniel prophesied: In a vision and said: I saw a Throne of Light: And upon it sat the Lord of hosts

cells.arabic: دَانِيَالٌ  تَنَبَّأ   فى  رُؤْيَاهُ  بِثُبَّات   قَال  رَأَيْت  كُرْسِيَّا  مِن  نُور   وعَلَيْهُ  رُبّ  الْقُوَّات

cells.english: And around Him thousands and thousands: Myriads and myriads: While praising God: The Holy King.

cells.arabic: وحَوْلهُ  أَلُوف  أَلُوف   رَبْوَات  مَع  طُغْمَات   يُسَبِّحُون  الله   الْمَلِك  الْقُدُّوس

cells.english: You were likened, O Mary; With the Throne of God the Creator: You held the Son of God: The living and unseen.

cells.arabic: تَشَبَّهَت  يامريم   بكرسى  الله  الْخَالِق   وَحَمَلَت  اِبْن  الله   الحى  النَّاطِق

cells.english: The fathers called you: The eastern door: Many spoke of you: O Virgin and bride.

cells.arabic: سَمَّاكَ  الْآبَاء   بَاب  الْمَشَارِق   وكَم  وَصَفُوا  عَنكَ   يابكرة  وَعَرُوس

cells.english: The Lord has chosen you: From the root of Jesse: From the pure and sanctified seed: The house of prophesy and rulers.

cells.arabic: الرَّبّ  إختارك   مِن  أَصِل  يسى   مِن  نَسْل  نَقَّى  طَاهِر   بَيْت  النُّبُوَّة  وَالرُّؤَسَاء

cells.english: You held Him in your womb: O Virgin and bride: You gave birth to Him and He drank your milk: Like all the humans. ${cross}

cells.arabic: وحملتيه  فى  أَحَشَاكَ   يابكره  وَعَرُوس   ولدتيه  وَرَضَع  لِبَنْك   هَوَس  رومى  إنتى  لِيُوس ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O you full of grace: Who are engulfed in light: O mother of the Merciful

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يامشتملة  بالانوار   ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us: On judgment day: Your Son granted us salvation: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا   فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   ياإبنة  صهيون

cells.english: Holy, Holy, Holy; a reading from the Gospel according to our teacher St. Luke [1: 68-72] the Evangelist. May his blessings be with us all. Amen.

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ   فَصِل  مِن  الانجيل  بحَسْب  لَوِقَا    الْبَشير   بَرَكَاتهُ  تَكَوَّن  مَعنَا   آمِين

cells.english: "Blessed is the Lord God of Israel. For He has visited and redeemed His people and has raised up a horn of salvation for us in the house of His servant David. As He spoke by the mouth of His holy prophets, who have been since the world began, that we should be saved from our enemies and from the hand of all who hate us to perform the mercy promised to our fathers and to remember His holy covenant. And Glory be to God forever. Amen. ${cross}

cells.arabic: مُبَارَك  الرَّبّ  إلَه  اسرائيل  لأَنّهُ  اِفْتَقَد  وَصَنْع  نَجَاة  لِشَعَّبهُ   وَأَقَام  لَنَا  قَرْن  خُلَّاص  مِن  بَيْت  دَاوُدٌ  عَبَّدهُ   لِيَذْكُر  رَحِمَتهُ  كَمَا  تَكَلَّم  مِن  أَفَوَاه  أَنْبِيَائه  الْأَطْهَار  مُنْذ  الْبَدْء   خُلَّاص  مِن  أَعَدَّائنَا    ومِن  أَيَدَى  كُلّ  مُبْغَضِيُّنَا   لِيَصْنَع  رَحْمَة  مَع  آبَائنَا  وَيَذْكُر  عَهِدهُ  الْمُقَدَّس   وَالْمَجْد  لِلَهّ  دَائِمَا  أَبْدَيَا  آمِين  ${cross}

english_title: Sunday Theotokia – 4th Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير الرابع

cells.english: O precious golden vessel: Which concealed the Manna: It was a symbol Of you: O Theotokos

cells.arabic: ياقسط  ذَهَب  غَالَى   وَاُلْمِنّ  مخفى  فِيهُ   رَمَزَا  وَإشَارَة   عَلَيْكَ  ياوالدة  الْإلَه

cells.english: O the precious gemstone: O ship of salvation: Blessed are you O Mary: The daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: ياحجر  الْجَوْهَر   ياسفينة  النَّجَاة   طُوبَاكَ  يامريم   ياإبنه  صهيون

cells.english: O ladder of Jacob: You held the Judge: And He dwelt in your womb: You gave birth to the Son of Man

cells.arabic: ياسلم  يَعْقُوب   حَمَلَت  الدَّيَّان  وَصَار   فى  أَحَشَاكَ  الْمَحْجُوب   وَوَلَدَت  اِبْن  الانسان

cells.english: He healed all the sick: And opened the eyes of the blind: And raised the dead: After their burial

cells.arabic: وَشَفَى  كُلّ  الْمَرْضَى   وَفَتْح  أعَيْن  الْعَمَيَانِ   وَأَقَام  الْمَيْت   بَعْد  أَنّ  كَان  مَدْفُون

cells.english: You are Aaron's rod: That blossomed: O the dome of Moses: That is filled with light

cells.arabic: ياعصاة  هَرَوْن   نَوَّرَت  الازهار   ياقبة  مُوسَى   الْمَمْلُوءَة  أَنُوَّار

cells.english: You are a planted vineyard: That bears the Fruit: Your Son granted us forgiveness: O hidden gem

cells.arabic: وَكَرَمَة  مغروسة   حَامِلَة  الْأَثْمَار   وَبِاِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْغُفْرَان   ياجوهر  مَكْنُون

cells.english: David said in the psalm: While playing on his harp: The Lord chose Zion: And came and dwelt in her.

cells.arabic: دَاوُدٌ  قَال  فى  الْمَزْمُور   وَقَال  عَلَى  الْقِيثَارَات   الرَّبّ  اِخْتَار  صهيون   وَسَكَن  فِيهَا  بِثُبَّات

cells.english: These are all symbols: Signs that resemble you: O Mary: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: هَذَا  كُلّهُ  مِثَال   وَرَمَزَا  واشارات   عَلَيْكَ  يامريم   ياابنة  صهيون

cells.english: The Lord chose your beauty: And God dwelt in your womb: You gave birth to Him: And He drank your milk

cells.arabic: الرَّبّ  اِخْتَار  حَسَّنكَ   وَسَكَن  فِيكَ  الْإلَه   ولدتيه  وَرَضَع  لَبَن   ثَدْيِيُّكَ  بفِيهُ

cells.english: You are greatly exalted: You became the highest heaven: You are above all ranks: The righteous and the saints

cells.arabic: اِرْتَفَعَت  جِدّا   وَصُرْت  كأعلا  سَمَّاهُ   فُقْت  كُلّ  الرُّؤَسَاء   وَالْأَبْرَار  وَالصَّدِيقَيْنِ

cells.english: You're above the Cherubim: O the pride of virgins: And higher than the Seraphim: Which are full of light

cells.arabic: فُقْت  الشاروبيم  ياست  الْأَبْكَار  وأَيْضا  السيرافيم  الْمَمْلُوءَة  أَنُوَّار

cells.english: O daughter of Joachim: From the upright seed: Your Son saved Adam: After his bondage

cells.arabic: ياإبنة  يواقيم   مِن  نَسْل  الْأَبْرَار   اِبْنكَ  خَلَص  آدَم   بَعْد  أَنّ  كَان  مَسْجُون

cells.english: O you full of grace: More pure than everyone: O mother of the Merciful: O you brighter than all light.

cells.arabic: يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   ياطهر  الْأَطْهَار   ياأم  الرَّحْمَة   يانور  الْأَنْوَار

cells.english: Your Son illuminated the darkness: And made us free: We inherited the kingdom: Through baptism and Holy Myron. ${cross}

cells.arabic: باِبْنكَ  زالت  الظُّلْمَة   وقَد  صُرنَا  أَحَرَّار   وَوَرِثنَا  الْمَلَكُوت   بِعِمَادنَا  بِالْمَيْرُون ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O you full of grace: Who are engulfed in light: O mother of the Merciful

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يامشتملة  بالانوار   ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us: On judgment day: Your Son granted us salvation: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا   فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   ياإبنة  صهيون

cells.english: Holy, Holy, Holy; a reading from the Gospel according to our teacher St. Luke [1: 73-77] the Evangelist. May his blessings be with us all. Amen.

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ   فَصِل  مِن  الانجيل  بحَسْب  لَوِقَا    الْبَشير   بَرَكَاتهُ  تَكَوَّن  مَعنَا   آمِين

cells.english: The oath, which He swore to our father Abraham: To grant us that we, being delivered from the hand of our enemies, might serve Him without fear, in holiness and righteousness before Him all the days of our life. "And you, child, will be called the prophet of the Highest, for you will go before the face of the Lord to prepare His ways. To give knowledge of salvation to His people by the remission of their sins, And Glory be to God forever. Amen ${cross}

cells.arabic: الْقِسْم  الذى  حِلْف  لإبراهيم  أَبِينَا  لِيُعْطِينَا  الْخُلَّاص  بغَيْر  خَوْف  مِن  أَيَدَى  أَعَدَّائنَا    لِنُخَدِّمهُ  بِطَهَارَة  وَبَرّ  أَمَامهُ  كُلّ  أَيَّام  حَيَاتنَا    وأَنْت  أَيّهَا  الصَّبَّى  تُدْعَى  نبى  الْعَلَى  لأَنّكَ  تُسَبِّق  بِالْمُسَيَّر  أَمَام  الرَّبّ  لِتُعِدّ  طَرِيقهُ    وَتُعْطَى  عِلْم  الْخُلَّاص  لِشَعَّبهُ  لِمَغْفِرَة  خَطَايَاهُمْ   وَالْمَجْد  لِلَهّ  دَائِمَا  أَبْدَيَا  آمِين  ${cross}

english_title: Sunday Theotokia – 5th Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير الخامس

cells.english: The Lord spoke to Moses: Upon the mount saying: Arise, build a lampstand: Overlay it with the chosen gold

cells.arabic: الله  كَلَّم  مُوسَى   فَوْق  جَبَل  الطَّوْر  أَجِهَار   قُم  أَصَنْع  مَنَارَة   مِن  الذَّهَب  الْمُخْتَار

cells.english: And upon it seven candles: To shine by day and night: From the inside of the dome: And from the ark

cells.arabic: وفِيهَا  سَبْعَة  سَرْج   تُنِير  لَيْل  و  نَهَار   مِن  دَاخِل  الْقُبَّة   نيم  تى  كيفوتوس

cells.english: He made it according to the plan: And built the lampstand: Out of precious gold: Blessed are you O chosen

cells.arabic: فَصَنْع  مُوسَى  كَمَا  قَال   وَصَنْع  الْمَنَارَة   مِن  الذَّهَب  الْعَال   طُوبَاكَ  يامختارة

cells.english: Blessed are you, O Mary: You gave meaning to the symbols: Your light dawned upon us: We the Christians

cells.arabic: طُوبَاكَ  يامريم   فَسُرْت  الامثال   وَنَوَّركَ  اِشْرَق  فِينَا   اِنْوِنّ  خانى  إخريستيانوس

cells.english: You are the lampstand: That is filled with light: And its light shined: Upon all the earth

cells.arabic: أَنْت  هى  الْمَنَارَة   الْمَمْلُوءَة  انوار   وَشُعَاع  نَوَّرهَا   أَشَرْق  عَلَى  كُلّ  الْأَقْطَار

cells.english: O Mary, you are higher: Than all the upright fathers: His Holy Spirit came upon you: The Holy Lord

cells.arabic: وَعُلِيَت  يامريم   عَن  الْآبَاء  الْأَبْرَار   حَلّ  بِرَوْح  قَدَّسهُ  فِيكَ   الرَّبّ  الْقُدُّوس

cells.english: Moses did see you: Upon Mount Tabor: A planted tree: Engulfed in light

cells.arabic: رآك  مُوسَى   فَوْق  جَبَل  الطَّوْر   شَجَرَة  مغروسة   مُحَاطَة  بِالْأَنْوَار

cells.english: Through you O Mary: We became victorious: No one has received: What you have been granted

cells.arabic: بِك  يامريم  فُزْنَا   بِفَرَح  وَبَهِجَة  وَسُرُور   مِن  نَال  مانلت   فى  سَائِر  بى  كوسموس

cells.english: There is no one like you: On earth or in heaven: The Lord favored you: Above all the creations

cells.arabic: لَيْس  مِن  يُشْبِهكَ   فى  الْأَرَض  ولَا  فى  السُّمُوَّات   وَالرَّبّ  فَضَّلكَ   عَن  كُلّ  الْمَخْلُوقَات

cells.english: Many spoke of you: In prophesies and proverbs: The fathers called you: The fair dove.

cells.arabic: وقَد  شَهِدُوا  عَنكَ   فى  اسفار  وَنُبُوَّات   سَمَّاكَ  الْآبَاء   تى  إتشرومبى  إثنيسوس

cells.english: David your father: In the psalms did say: “The Lord choose your beauty: And increased you in splendor.

cells.arabic: دَاوُدٌ  أَبُوكَ   فى  الْمَزْمُور  قَد  قَال   الرَّبّ  إختار  حَسَّنكَ   وَزَادكَ  نُور  وَجَمَال

cells.english: He dwelt in your womb: Nine full months: You gave birth to Him, He drank your milk: According to the angel's decree.

cells.arabic: وَحَلّ  فى  بَطَنكَ   تِسْعَة  أَشَهْر  بِكَمَال   ولدتيه  وَرَضَع  لِبَنْك   كَبِشَارَة  بى  أنجيلوس

cells.english: He likewise said: O mother of Man: A Man dwelt in her: The Most High King.

cells.arabic: وَقَال  ايضا   ياأم  الْإِنْسَان   وَإِنْسَان  حَلّ  فِيهَا   وهُو  الْمَلِك  الدَّيَّان

cells.english: He Who overshadowed her: And sent her His Holy Spirit: You gave birth to the True God: The Creator of souls. ${cross}

cells.arabic: الذى  انشأها  وَأَرْسَل   لَهَا  رَوَّح  قَدَّسهُ  بِبَيَان   وَوَضَعَت  الله  اِلْحَق   الْخَالِق  كُلّ  نُفُوس ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O you full of grace: Who are engulfed in light: O mother of the Merciful

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يامشتملة  بالانوار   ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us: On judgment day: Your Son granted us salvation: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا   فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   ياإبنة  صهيون

cells.english: Holy, Holy, Holy; a reading from the Gospel according to our teacher St. Luke [1: 78-79] the Evangelist. May his blessings be with us all. Amen.

cells.arabic: قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ  قَدُّوسٌ   فَصِل  مِن  الانجيل  بحَسْب  لَوِقَا  :  )  الْبَشير   بَرَكَاتهُ  تَكَوَّن  مَعنَا   آمِين

cells.english: Through the tender mercy of our God, with which the dayspring from on high has visited us. To give light to those who sit in darkness and the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace." And Glory be to God forever. Amen ${cross}

cells.arabic: مِن  أَجَل  تُحَنِّن  رَحْمَة  إلَهنَا  بهَذِه  الذى  اِفْتَقَدنَا  بِه  مَشْرِقَا  مِن  الْعَلَاء  لِيُضِئ  لِلْجَالِسِينَ  فى  الظُّلْمَة  وَظِلَال  الْمَوْت    لِتَسْتَقِيم  أَرَجِلْنَا  إِلَى  سَبَّل  السُّلَّام   وَالْمَجْد  لِلَهّ  دَائِمَا  أَبْدَيَا  آمِين  ${cross}

english_title: Sunday Theotokia – 6th Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير السادس

cells.english: You are Aaron's censer: Who carries the Ember: Its incense and aroma: Filled all the universe.

cells.arabic: ياشورية  هَرَوْن   الْحَامِلَة  جَمْر  النَّار   وَبُخُورهَا  وَعَنْبَرهَا   مَلَأ  كُلّ  الْأَقْطَار

cells.english: Your presence O Mary: Has saved us from hell's fire: The promise was fulfilled through you: As was prophesied.

cells.arabic: بِوُجُودكَ  يامريم   فُزْنَا  مِن  حُرّ  النَّار   وبِك  تَمّ  الْمَوْعُود   كَمَا  عَنكَ  تنبأون

cells.english: You are the censer: In it are the ointment and incense: You held the Son of God: Light of Light.

cells.arabic: أَنْت  هى  الشُّورَيَة   فِيهَا  طَيِّب  وَبُخُور   حَمَلَت  إبن  الله   إلَه  نُور  مِن  نُور

cells.english: He dwelt in your womb: For nine months: You gave birth to Him: He drank your milk, Like all humans.

cells.arabic: وَحَلّ  فى  بَطَنكَ   تِسْعَة  شهور   ولدتيه  وَرَضَع  لِبَنْك   كَسَائِر  الْمَخْلُوقِينَ

cells.english: You are Aaron's censer: In it is the incense Ember: O daughter of David: O precious stone.

cells.arabic: ياشورية  هَارُونٌ   فِيهَا  بُخُور  مِن  عَنْبَر   ياإبنة  دَاوُدٌ   ياحجر  الْجَوْهَر

cells.english: You held the worshipped: And He appeared from you: He freed those in bondage: And trampled down Satan.

cells.arabic: حَمَلَت  الْمَعْبُود   وَظُهْر  مِنكَ  أَجِهَار   وَفَكّ  كُلّ  وَثَاقَات   وَكَسْر  فَخّ  الاركون

cells.english: You are the censer: The aroma of your incense spread: And filled all the earth: And through you we received joy,

cells.arabic: اُنْت  هى  الشُّورَيَة   بُخُور  طَيَّبكَ  فَاح   وَمَلَأ  الْمَسْكُونَة   وبِك  نُلنَا  الأفراح

cells.english: We offer you praise: In the eve and in the morn: O pillar of faith: For the Orthodox people.

cells.arabic: نُقْرِئكَ  كُلّ  سُلَّام   فى  كُلّ  مَسَاء  وَصَبَاح   ياعمود  دِين   الأرثوذكسيين

cells.english: Solomon spoke of you: In the Song of Songs: My sister and my friend: The Lord favored her.

cells.arabic: سَلِيمَانِ  قَال  عَنكَ   فى  نُشِيد  الأنشاد   أُخْتَى  وصديقتى   وَالِيكَ  الرَّبّ  اراد

cells.english: Your sweet aroma spread: From the Ember and increased: He gave symbols of you: In many prophecies.

cells.arabic: رَوَائِح  طَيَّبكَ  فَاح   مِن  عَنْبَر  وَزَاد   وَقَال  عَنكَ  امثال   فى  النُّبُوَّات  يَشْهَدُون

cells.english: Blessed are you, O Mary: O the mother of Jesus Christ: O pure sanctuary: And the shelter of the Holy.

cells.arabic: طُوبَاكَ  يامريم   أَم  ايسوس  بى  اخريستوس   ياهيكل  طَاهِر   وَحِجَاب  لِلْقَدُّوسِ

cells.english: Protect your Son's people: Deacons and presbyters: And all the lay people: And those gathered together.

cells.arabic: احفظى  شَعْب  اِبْنكَ   شمامسة  وَقُسُوس   وجَمِيع  مِن  فى  الْبَيْعَة   الشَّعْب  الْمُجْتَمَعُونَ

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O sanctuary for protection: Your Light dawned upon us: And filled all the earth.

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   ياهيكل  منصان   نَوَّركَ  أَشَرْق  فِينَا   وَمَلَأ  كُلّ  الْأَكْوَان

cells.english: You held the Creator: The Son of God, the Judge: You gave birth to His Humanity: With the united Divinity. ${cross}

cells.arabic: وَحَمَلَت  الْخَالِق   اِبْن  الله  الدَّيَّان   وولدتيه  انسان   بِاللَّاَهُوت  مُتَّحِدُونَ ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O you full of grace: Who are engulfed in light: O mother of the Merciful

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يامشتملة  بالانوار   ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us: On judgment day: Your Son granted us salvation: O daughter of Zion

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا   فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   ياإبنة  صهيون

english_title: Sunday Theotokia – 7th Explanation
arabic_title: تيوطوكيا الأحد - التفسير السابع

cells.english: You are called, O Theotokos: The daughter of Joachim: You became the highest heaven: You're higher than the Cherubim.

cells.arabic: دُعِيَت  أَم  الله   ياإبنة  يواقيم   وَصُرْت  كأعلا  سَمَّاهُ   وَفُقْت  الكاروبيم

cells.english: The Fountain of Life came forth from You: He healed all the sick: He returned the lost sheep: To the Paradise of Joy.

cells.arabic: ظُهْر  مِنكَ  يَنْبُوع  الْحَيَاة   وَأَبْرَأ  كُلّ  سَقِيم   وَرَدّ  الْخَرُوف  الضَّالّ   وَحَطَّم  فَخّ  الأركون

cells.english: You are the dome of Moses: That is filled with Light: You are the ark of covenant: Containing the secrets.

cells.arabic: ياقبة  مُوسَى   يامملوءة  انوار   ياتابوت  الْعَهْد   وفِيهُ  كُلّ  الاسرار

cells.english: O the flower of incense: Your aroma filled the earth: O precious treasure: O Aaron's rod.

cells.arabic: يازهرة  الاطياب   بُخُوركَ  مَلَأ  الْأَقْطَار   ياكنز  الْجَوْهَر   ياعصاة  هَرَوْن

cells.english: O golden vessel: In it the hidden Manna: O pure sanctuary: Wherein God was delighted and dwelled.

cells.arabic: ياقسط  ذَهَب  غَالَى   وَاُلْمِنّ  مخفى  فِيهُ   ياهيكل  طَاهِر   أَحَبّهُ  الله  وَسَكَن  فِيهُ

cells.english: He who believes in Him: Shall live after death: O you pure altar: Carrying the hidden secrets.

cells.arabic: ومِن  يُؤَمِّن  بَاسِمهُ   بَعْد  الْمَوْت  يُحَيِّيهِ   يامذبح  طَاهِر   حَامِل  السِّرّ  الْمَكْنُون

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O favored above all virgins: The fathers called you: “The golden lampstand.”

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   ياست  الْعَذَارَى   سَمَّاكَ  الْآبَاء   كَنَزَا  وَمَنَارَة

cells.english: Many spoke of you: With symbols and proverbs: O the aroma of Ember: In Aaron's censer.

cells.arabic: وكَم  ضَرَبُوا  عَنكَ   رَمَزَا  وَإشَارَة   يَا  بُخُور  الْعَنْبَر   فى  شُورَيَة  هَارُونٌ

cells.english: O sanctuary and protection: A dwelling place for the Trinity: O Throne of God the Father: The Lord of Hosts.

cells.arabic: ياهيكل  وَحِجَاب   مَسْكَن  لِلثَّالُوث   ياكرسى  الله  الآب   رُبّ  الصاباؤوت

cells.english: Through you O Mary, we were awarded: The kingdom of Joy: Blessed are you O Mary: The sister of Solomon.

cells.arabic: بِك  يَا  مَرْيَمٌ   فُزْنَا  بِنَعِيم  الْمَلَكُوت   طُوبَاكَ  يامريم   إتسونى  ان  سولومون

cells.english: Do not forget your servant: For I am a poor sinner: I plead for your intercessions: On judgment day.

cells.arabic: لاتنسى  عَبَّدكَ   لِأَنَى  خاطى  وَمِسْكِين   وَأَرْجُو  شَفَاعَتكَ   فى  الْمَوْقِف  يَوْم  الدِّين

cells.english: Before Christ your Son: Be unto me a helper and provider: So He may forgive me: The multitude of sins. ${cross}

cells.arabic: عِنْد  يَسُوع  اِبْنكَ   كَوَنَى  لى  عَوّنَا  وَمُعَيَّن   لكى  يَغْفِر  لى  ذنبى   ومِن  قَد  سَلَفُونَ ${cross}

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary: O you full of grace: Who are engulfed in light: O mother of the Merciful.

cells.arabic: السُّلَّام  لَك  يامريم   يامملوءة  نَعَمَة   يامشتملة  بالانوار   ياام  الرَّحْمَة

cells.english: Intercede for us: On judgment day: Your Son granted us salvation: O daughter of Zion. ${cross}

cells.arabic: إشفعى  فِينَا   فى  يَوْم  الزَّحْمَة   باِبْنكَ  نُلنَا  الْخُلَّاص   ياإبنة  صهيون ${cross}

english_title: Praise on Shere Ne Maria
arabic_title: مديح على شيري ني ماريا

cells.english: Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: I start my praise Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Words from my heart Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: I cry out and say Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: A rhythmic song
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: أبدأ فيك بمديح Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: نظم بقلب صحيح Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وأشرح فيك وأصيح Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: قول غالي موزون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Every needy one Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Rejoices and feels calm Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You brought all joy Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: To every living soul
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بمديحك يرتاح Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: كل ذليل محتاج Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: يابدء الأفراح Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: لك عندي عربون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: O sweet fruit Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Apple of my eye Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: No one can deny Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are from on high
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ثمرة عربونى Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: هى طب عيونى Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: فى مدحك لامونى Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: كم عنى يقولون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Gabriel came Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: With tidings and name Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Emmanuel became Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: In your womb the same
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: جاءك غبريال Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ببشائر وأقوال Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وسكن فيك المتعال Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: سر خفي مكنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The Logos dwelt Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Able and shined Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You became heaven Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Fruitful and green
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: حل بكلمته Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وأشرق بقدرته Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: صرت كسمائه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ياعوسج بغصون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Savior of the world Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Became in your womb Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Was born of you Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The Holy Spirit in you
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: مخلص العالم Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: صارفيك قائم Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: واستيقظ النائم Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ومخمور بفنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: David in the Psalms Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Said you are the bride Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Offerings and gifts Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Was given to the One
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: داود فى المزمور Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: قال بنات صور Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بهدايا ونذور Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: قالوا فيك بفنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Myriads and myriads Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Around the Throne Stands Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Hosts and ranks Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Many martyrs
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ربوات ثم ألوف Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: حول العرش وقوف Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وطغمات وصفوف Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وشهداء متصلون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are beyond Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Above all codes Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are purity respond Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Any questions
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: زدت فى الأوصاف Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: عن كل الأوصاف Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ومشيتى بعفاف Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وسميت صهيون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Witnessed by Salome Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The Virgin from the Womb Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Gave birth to Whom Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: While sealed by the One
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: سالومى شهدت Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بأن العذراء وضعت Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: آمنت وأعتقدت Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: والخاتم مصون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Isaiah had said Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: That, your Son, Jesus Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Was born of you Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: In the right season
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: أشعياء قال عنك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بأن يسوع ابنك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وخرج من بطنك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ونظرناه بعيون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Zephaniah proclaimed Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: That Jesus appeared Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: As rain and dew Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Surrounded by numerous ranks
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: صوفونيوس خبر Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بأن يسوع يظهر Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: شبه ندي ومطر Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: حوله صفوف لايحصون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are blessed Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You confused them all Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: By the water and Spirit Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: We conquered Satan
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: طوباك ثم طوباك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: حيرت العلماء Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بوجود الروح والماء Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: قهرنا الأركون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Many thought in you Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: That this was illegal Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Till He raised Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The dead and healed the sick
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ظنوا فيك أقوام Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بإن الحبل ده حرام Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: حتى حل وأقام Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: الأموات والمجنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The fathers said Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: A dome in a cloud Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The dome of the Church Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Your support we search
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: شبهك الاباء Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: قبة وسحابة Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ووضعوا بإجابة Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وجميعهم فيك محتارون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Many before came Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Praised and did not find Him Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Many came after Him Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: But the Mighty was down
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: غلب أقوام سبقوه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: مدحوا مالحقوه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: جاءوا بعده وجدوه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بسر خفى مكنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: My heart rejoice Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: For you are my choice Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: O Mary we praise Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: We cry with voices
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: فيك رضا قلبى Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: من شأن طلبى Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: يامريم حسبي Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: تاجي وأنا دون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are Moses dome Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Ornamented all Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: In all four corners Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: With instruments and arts
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: قبة موسى كان Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: زخرفها بالألوان Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وجعل فيها الأركان Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بكل آله وفنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: God has in the dome Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Many prayers and calls Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: The can is the love sign Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Were the manna in it
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: لله فى القبة Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: صلوات وطلبة Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: والقسط علامة المحبة Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: المن فيه مكنون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: A pure censer Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Holding the aroma Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are the Ark of covenant Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Carrying the True Word
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: مجمرة التصعيد Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: زهرة عطر تقيد Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ياتابوت عهد جديد Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بصفائح وقرون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You carried the Light Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Like seven minarets lit Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You're Aaron's rod Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Which alone blossomed
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: نالوا نور من نور Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: سبع سرج ينيرون Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وقضيب كان مذخور Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: بأسم الأب هرون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: You are the altar Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: With incense offered Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Many prophesied Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: And were fulfilled
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: هيكل بموائد Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وبخور وصعائد Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وآيات وشواهد Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: عنك يتنبأون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: All what they said Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: In the dome they found Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: As your purity showed Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: Her virginity sealed
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: وجميع ما وضعوه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: في القبة وجدوه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: ولقدسك ذكروه Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: عذراء بكر مصون
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: We ask of you Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: To ask your Son Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: O blessed Mary Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: To forgive us ${cross}
Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: لازم نترجاك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: عند الابن عساك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: يامريم طوباك Ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ̀: راعينا بعيون ${cross}

english_title: Rashi O Maria
arabic_title: راشي او ماريا

cells.english: Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Adam became Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: After he was contrite Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Was defiant and sinful Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Won and shamed the devil

cells.arabic1: Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: بك أصبح آدم Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: بعد أن كان نادم Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: كان مخالف وآثم Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: فاز وأخزى الأركون

cells.english: Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: O joy of Able Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Crown of Israel Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: You were given honor Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: From all those who praise

cells.arabic1: Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا فرح هابيل Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وتاج إسرائيل Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: أعطيت التهليل Ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: بجميع من يمدحون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: O grace of Abraham ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Isaac remains safe ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Jacob was a leader ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Joseph was seen with his eyes

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا نعمة إبراهيم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: هوذا إسحق سليم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يعقوب كان زعيم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: جاءه يوسف ورآه بعيوم

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: David chanted and said ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: In you explained sayings ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: And also in proverbs ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Wisdom of Solomon

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: داود رتل وقال ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: فيك شرح أقوال ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وأيضاً فى الأمثال ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: حكمة سولومون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Your are the explained throne ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Like the arc of Noah ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: A flower's aroma spread ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: And olive branches

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: أنت الكرسى المشروح ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: شبه سفينة نوح ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: زهرة عطر تفوح ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وأغصان الزيتون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Chariot of the Cherubim ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Wings of the Seraphim ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: O daughter of Joachim ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Censor of Aaron

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: مركبة الشاروبيم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: أجنحة السيرافيم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: ياإبنة يواقيم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: شورية مع هرون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: You’re the grace of Peter ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: O wisdom of Paul ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: O joy of Phillip ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Purity of the confessors

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: أنت نعمة بطرس ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا حكمة بولس ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا فرحة فيلبس ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: طهر المعترفين

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Salvation of Matthias ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Belief of Thomas ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: O Holy of Holies ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: The zeal of Simon

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا خلاص متياس ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وأمانة توماس ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا قدس الأقداس ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: أنت غيرة سيمون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Crown of martyrs ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Joy began by you ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Conquered the enemies ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: And shamed the devil

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: إكليل الشهداء ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: بك الفرح بدأ ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: قهرت الأعداء ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وأخزيت الأركون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Mother of the Incarnate ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Seed of our father David ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: You fulfilled the economy ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: A fortified castle

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يا أم المولود ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: نسل الآب داود ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: كملت المقصود ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: أنت قلعة بحصون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: After you gave birth to Him ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: On your shoulders carried Him ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: A Child, you nursed Him ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: How can this be

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: من بعد ما ولدتيه ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: على كتفك حملتيه ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: طفل وأرضعتيه ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: كيف هذا الأمر يهون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: A hidden mystery ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: From the created world ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: A secret that was realized ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: After it was concealed

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: هذا سر مكتوم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: عن الكون المرسوم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: سر صار مفهوم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: بعد أن كان مكنون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: He who is enlightened ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Searches these mysteries ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: This is Light of Light ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: No one can surmise

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: من هو صاحب أفكار ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: يفحص هذه الأسرار ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: هذا نور من نور ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: لا تدركه ظنون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: If I say I fathom ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Some of its meanings ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: I cannot describe ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: To the high and the lowly

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وإن قلت إنى أحويه ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وبعض معانيه ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: ما أقدر أرويه ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: للعالى والدون

cells.english: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: If the witness said ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Account of your honor stands ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: But with resolve ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: Attained from you ${cross}

cells.arabic1: ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وإن قال الناظر ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: وصف شرفك قائم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: لكن بعزائم ⲣⲁϣⲓ ⲱ̀ ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: منك متصلون ${cross}

english_title: O M A R Y
arabic_title: يا م ر ى م

cells.english: O Mary: Lady of virgins: you attained greatness: from the True Light: You are exalted: by the Lord Himself: you bore the Creator: O what a great marvel!

cells.enPhonics1: Ya meem reh yeh meem: ya set el-abkar: qad nelty taazeem: men noor el-anwar: wa wohebty taazeem: men endoo qad sar: wa Hamalty al-khaleq: man za la yaHtar.

cells.arabic: يَا  م  ر  ى  م :  ياست  الْأَبْكَار :  قَد  نُلْت  تَعْظِيم :  مِن  نُور  الْأَنْوَار :  وَوَهَبَت  تَعْظِيم :  مِن  عِنْدهُ  قَد  صَار :  وَحَمَلَت  الْخَالِق :  مِن  ذَا  لَا  يَحْتَار

cells.english: Wondrous among nations: wisdom to rulers: a hidden gem: and the gospel spoke of you:: They give you blessings: in all generations: O daughter of Joachim: exalted above the Cherubim.

cells.enPhonics1: Qad serty ogooba: lel roasa amthal: dorrah maHgooba: wa fi el-engeel qad qal: yotonek el-tooba: fi kol al-gial: ya ebnat youaqeem: qad foqty el-Cheroubim.

cells.arabic: قَد  صُرْت  اعجوبة :  لِلرُّؤَسَاء  امثال :  دُرَّة  مَحْجُوبَة :  وفِي  الانجيل  قَد  قَال :  يُعْطُونكَ  الطُّوبَا :  فِي  كُلّ  الاجيال :  يَا  اِبْنَة  يواقيم :  قَد  فَقَتِّيٌّ  الشاروبيم

cells.english: You attained what no one could: O Mother of the Mercy: and you became: filled with grace: To the Divine you became: a veil for the Word: and greatly marveled: were you among the scholars.

cells.enPhonics1: Man nal ma nelty: ya om el-raHma: wa anty qaad serty: mamlooa nema: wa lel lahot serty: Hegaban lel-kalema: wa aHtar fiki: arbab al-tafheem.

cells.arabic: مِن  نَال  مَا  نلتى :  يَا  ام  الرَّحْمَة :  وَاُنْتِي  قَد  صُرَّتي :  مملؤة  نَعُمّهُ :  وَلِلَاَهُوت  صُرَّتي :  حِجَابَا  لِلْكَلِمَة :  وَاِحْتَار  فِيكَ   ارباب  التَّفْهِيم

cells.english: O tabernacle of the covenant: O censer of Aaron: O spirit of glory: O daughter of Zion: O the light of eyes: with you we rejoice: and abide in grace: O full of grace.

cells.enPhonics1: Ya taboot el-ahde: ya magmaret Haroun: ya roH el-magd: ya ebnat Sehioun: ya noor el-oyoon: beky nasadoo: wa naHza bel-naeem: ya mamloua nema.

cells.arabic: يَا  تَابُوت  الْعَهْد :  يَا  مُجَمَّرَة  هَارُونٌ :  يَا  رَوَّح  الْمَجْد :  يَا  اِبْنَة  صهيون :  يَا  نُور  الْعُيُون :  بِك  نُسْعِد :  وَنُحْظِي  بِالنَّعِيم :  يَا  مملؤة  نَعُمّهُ

cells.english: O full of grace: the fortifying fortress: the jewel of mercy: the aid of the poor: Your son has purged death: O the intercessor of saints: intercede for us: O Mother of Mercy.

cells.enPhonics1: Ya mamloua nema: anty el-Hesn el-Haseen: anty kanz el-raHma: ya awn al-masakeen: be-ebnek zalet el naqma: ya sahfiat el-qedisin: Wa shafietna fil-zaHma: ya om el-raHim.

cells.arabic: يَا  مملؤة  نَعُمّهُ :  اُنْت  اِلْحَصِنّ  الْحَصِين   اُنْت  كَنْز  الرَّحْمَة   يَا  عَوْن  الْمَسَاكِين :  بإبنك  زالت  النِّقَمَة :  يَا  شَفِيعَة  الْقِدِّيسِينَ :  وَشَفِيعَتنَا  فِي  الزَّحْمَة :  يَا  ام  الرَّحِيم

cells.english: Hail to you: O Lady of virgins: O daughter of Joachim: the chosen throne: Righteous is your Son: He purged our shame: the glorious God: the Creator of ages.

cells.enPhonics1: Noqadem laky a-tazeem: ya set el-abkar: ya ebnat Yowaqim: ya korseyan mokhtar: wel-mawlood menky karim: azal anna al-ar: al-elah el-azeem: khalek el ad-har.

cells.arabic: نُقَدِّم  لَك  التَّعْظِيم :  ياست  الْأَبْكَار :  يَا  اِبْنَة  يواقيم :  يَا  كُرْسِيَّا  مُخْتَار :  وَالْمَوْلُود  مِنكَ  كَرِيم :  ازال  عَنَا  الْعَار :  الاله  الْعَظِيم :  خَالِق  الادهار

cells.english: The adornment of virgins: the holy Mother: the purity of the pure: O light of lights: O jewel of grace: O Mother of Mercy: truly you are the vine: filled and bearing fruit.

cells.enPhonics1: Ya zen el-abkar: ya qods el-aHbar: ya tohr el-at-har: ya noor el-anwar: ya kanz al-nema: ya om el-raHma: anty heya al-karma: al-mamloua athmar.

cells.arabic: يَا  زَيَّن  الْأَبْكَار :  يَا  قُدْس  الْأَحْبَار :  يَا  طَهَر  الْأَطْهَار :  يَا  نُور  الْأَنْوَار :  يَا  كَنْز  النَّعَمَة :  يَا  ام  الرَّحْمَة   أَنْت  هِي  الْكَرَمَة :  المملؤة  أَثْمَار

cells.english: O daughter of Joachim: you attained greatness: you are Jerusalem: glorious and honored: You are Zion: O precious jewel;: you released the captive: from the Deceiver’s hand.

cells.enPhonics1: Ya ebnat Yowaqim: qad nelty al-tazeem: anty heya Orshaleem: zat al-magd wal fakhar: anty heya Sehioun: ya gawharan maknoon: fakakty el-masgoon: men yad el-makar.

cells.arabic: يَا  اِبْنَة  يواقيم :  قَد  نُلْت  التَّعْظِيم :  اُنْت  هِي  اورشليم :  ذَات  الْمَجْد  وَالْفَخَّار :  اُنْت  هِي  صهيون :  يَا  جُوهِرَا  مَكْنُون :  فَكَّكَت  الْمَسْجُون :  مِن  يَد  الْمَكَّار

cells.english: Your son saved Adam: the repentant sinner: humanity He set free: from all adversaries: The Lord from your childhood: witnessed your purity: and therefore has blessed you: before all nations.

cells.enPhonics1: Ebnek khalas Adam: el-khaty el-nadem: we ataq el-alam: men kol el-adrar: rabek men soghrek: lamma raa tohrek: qad tayab zekrek: fi kol el-aqtar.

cells.arabic: اِبْنكَ  خَلَص  اِدْم :  الْخَاطِئ  النَّادِم :  وَعِتْق  الْعَالَم :  مِن  كُلّ  الاضرار :  رَبّكَ  مِن  صَغَّركَ :  لَمَّا  رَأْي  طَهَركَ :  قَد  طَيِّب  ذَكَركَ   فِي  كُلّ  الاقطار

cells.english: He sent you Gabriel: the Messenger of His words: and greeted you saying: The Lord has chosen you: His Holy Spirit: filled and dwelt within you: blessed are you O Virgin: throughout all ages."

cells.enPhonics1: Arsal laky Ghabrial: bemoHkam el aqwal: wa basharek ez qal: Allaho laky ekhtar: roH qodsoh malaky: wa sakan fi aHshaky: ya adra toobaky: fi kol el agial.

cells.arabic: اِرْسَل  لَك  غبريال :  بِمُحْكَم  الاقوال :  وَبَشَّركَ  اذ  قَال :  الله  لَك  اِخْتَار :  رَوَّح  قَدَّسهُ  مَلَّاكَ :  وَسَكَن  فِي  احشاك  يَا   عَذَرَا  طُوبَاكَ :  فِي  كُلّ  الاجيال

cells.english: The Unseen and Holy: was born from you: and was called Jesus: for all eyes to see: Moses saw the bush: blazing with fire: its branches flaming: yet the bush was not consumed.

cells.enPhonics1: An gher el-maHsoos: al-rab el qodoos: menky ata wa doaya Isoos: wa nazarat-ho el-absar: Mousa raa al-awsag: wal-nar fihi tata-gag: wa aghsanoh tatawahag: ma darat-ho al-nar.

cells.arabic: ان  غَيْر  الْمَحْسُوس :  الرَّبّ  الْقُدُّوس :  مِنكَ  اتي  وَدُعِي  ايسوس :  وَنَظَرَتهُ  الابصار :  موسي  رَأْي  الْعَوْسَج :  وَالنَّار  فِيهُ  تَتَأَجَّج :  وَأَغْصَانهُ  تَتَوَهَّج :  مَا  ضَرَّتهُ  النَّار

cells.english: The blazing bush: which Moses had seen: was indeed Mary: the adornment of virgins: The fire is Jesus: the Holy Lord: who gave us the Law: engraved in stone.

cells.enPhonics1: Ena ma raat-ho al-aynan: moltaheban bel-niran: fi el-awsag wal-aghsan: heya Mariam zenat el-abkar: wel-nar heya Isoos: al-rab el-qodoos: motina el-namoos: maktooban fil-aHgar.

cells.arabic: ان  مَا  رَأَتهُ  الْعَيْنَانِ :  مُلْتَهِبَا  بِالنِّيَرَان :  فِي  الْعَوْسَج  وَالْأَغْصَان :  هِي  مَرْيَمٌ  زَيْنَة  الْأَبْكَار :  وَالنَّار  هِي  إيسوس :  الرَّبّ  الْقُدُّوس :  مُعْطِينَا  النَّامُوس :  مَكْتُوبَا  فِي  الاحجار

cells.english: Isaiah prophesied: about the birth: of Emmanuel: the Almighty King: Ezekiel saw a door: through which the Lord entered: He sealed the door and claimed it: highly exalted.

cells.enPhonics1: Fi Asheya qad qeel: an haza el-taweel: taled emanoueel: al-malek el-gabar: wa Hazqeyal raa bab: dakhal feeh rab el-arbab: wa khetm el-bab mohab: alya el-meqdar.

cells.arabic: فِي  اِشْعَيَا  قَد  قِيل :  عَن  هَذَا  التأويل :  تَلِد  عمانوئيل :  الْمَلِك  الْجَبَّار :  وَحِزْقِيَالٌ  رَأْي  بَاب :  دَخَل  فِيهُ  رُبّ  الارباب :  وَخَتَم  الْبَاب  مَهَابّ :  عَالِيٌّ  الْمِقْدَار

cells.english: Highly exalted are you: and your Son Jesus: when He was born of you: the earth was adorned: And also Daniel: prophesied and said: I saw the high throne: highly exalted.

cells.enPhonics1: Alen howa qadrek: lean yasoo ebnek: lamma woled mennek: tazayanat el-aktar: wa aydan Danial: tanaba Haytho qal: raayto el-korsy el-al: aleya el meqdar.

cells.arabic: عَال  هُو  قَدَّركَ :  لإِن  يَسُوع  اِبْنكَ :  لَمَّا  وَلَد  مِنكَ :  تَزَيَّنَت  الاقطار :  وايضا  دَانِيَالٌ :  تَنَبَّأ  حَيْث  قَال :  رَأَيْت  الْكُرْسِيّ  الْعَال :  عَالِيٌّ  الْمِقْدَار

cells.english: In the firmaments high I saw: one like the Son of Man: who has dominion: over all the earth: He is the Lord of Hosts: around Him are the ranks: thousands and myriads: glorifying in reverence.

cells.enPhonics1: Nazarto fok el-arkan: shebh ebn el-ensan: wa laho al-soltan: ala kol el aqtar: wa howa rabo el-qowat: wa men Hawloh taghamat: oloof wa rabawat: be ezamen wa waqar.

cells.arabic: نَظَرَت  فَوْق  الْأَرْكَان :  شِبْه  اِبْن  الانسان :  ولَه  السُّلْطَان :  عُلِي  كُلّ  الْأَقْطَار :  وهُو  رُبّ  الْقُوَّات :  ومِن  حَوْلهُ  طُغْمَات   الوف  وَرَبْوَات :  بِعَظْم  وَوَقَار

cells.english: O daughter of Joachim: you are exalted above: the Cherubim and Seraphim: and all righteous fathers: The Lord was born from you: and David praises you: with his harp he sings: playing its ten strings.

cells.enPhonics1: Ya ebnat Yowaqim: foqt el-karoubim: aydan el-serafaim: wa kol el-aba el-abrar: menky ga el-mawlood: al-rab el-mabood: yamdaH fiki Dawood: bel-asharat awtar.

cells.arabic: ياابنة  يواقيم :  فُقْت  الْكَرُوبِيمُ :  وايضا  السرافيم :  وكُلّ  الاباء  الابرار :  مِنكَ  جَاء  الْمَوْلُود :  الرَّبّ  الْمَعْبُود   يَمْدَح  فِيكَ  دَاوُدٌ :  بِالْعُشُرَة  أَوْتَار

cells.english: The sound of the first string: is in honor of your name: the Virgin will carry: the Almighty King: And with the second string: David rejoices: chanting with hymns: while playing his harp.

cells.enPhonics1: El-watar el-awal: qawlon mobagal: wel-adra taHbal: bel-malek el-gabar: el-watar el-thany: Dawood bil-tahany: yoratel bel-alHan: ma darb el-qithar.

cells.arabic: الْوَتَر  الاول :  قَوْل  مُبَجَّل :  وَالْعَذْرَاء  تَحْبُل   بِالْمَلِك  الْجَبَّار :  الْوَتَر  الثَّانِي :  دَاوُدٌ  بالتهاني :  و  يُرَتِّل  بالالحان :  مَع  ضَرْب  القيثار

cells.english: And the third O daughter: because you were faithful: you were filled with light: and the Lord chose you: The fourth string is sounded: so that all can hear: of her who is praised: all over the world.

cells.enPhonics1: Wel-thaleth ya ibna: anty motamana: bel-noor moshtamala: wal-rabo laky ekhtar: el-watar el-rabe: esghy ya same: za qawlon shae: fi kol el-aqtar.

cells.arabic: الثَّالِث  يَا  اِبْنَة :  أَنْت  مُؤْتَمَنَة :  بالنورمشتملة :  وَالرَّبّ  لَك  إختار :  الْوَتَر  الرَّابِع :  اِصْغ  يَا  سَامِع :  ذَا  قَوْل  شَائِع :  فِي  كُلّ  الاقطار

cells.english: The fifth is a sign of hope: as a dove she appears: with Ophir gold: upon her shoulders: With the sixth he sung: praises I will not hide: but I will praise with him: and proclaim to all.

cells.enPhonics1: Wel-khames khabar: Hamama heya tazhar: bel-zahab el-asfar: ala menkabayha sar: wel-sades qal fih: qawlan ma akhfih: lakeny arweeh: wa osh-heraho eg-har.

cells.arabic: الْخَامِس  خَبَر :  حَمَامَة  هِي  تَظْهَر :  بِالذَّهَب  الْاِصْفَرُّ :  عُلِي  مُنْكَبِّيُّهَا  صَار :  السَّادِس  قَال  فِيهُ :  قُولَا  مَا  أُخْفِيهِ :  لُكنِي  أَرْوِيهِ :  وَاِشْهَرهُ  أَجِهَار

cells.english: With the seventh string he said: O mountain, of the High God: the High took flesh from you: without a doubt: And with the eighth he sang: to the Virgin Mary: the Great chose her: and crowned her with honor.

cells.enPhonics1: Wel-sabe ez qal: ya gabal Allah el-al: tagasad menky el-motaal: bela shak wala enkar: wel-thamen ranam: lel-adra Mariam: ekhtarha al-moazam: wa kallalha bel-fakhar.

cells.arabic: السَّابع  اذ  قَال :  يَا  جَبَل  الله  الْعَال :  تُجَسِّد  مِنكَ  المتعال :  بِلَا  شَكّ  ولَا  إِنْكَار :  وَالثَّامِن  رَنَّم :  للعذ  را  مَرْيَمٌ :  اِخْتَارهَا  الْمُعْظَم :  وَكَلَّلهَا  بِالْفَخَّار

cells.english: With the ninth string he said: from her will surely come: God her son: who sealed her virginity: With the tenth he sang: the Powerful God: in Zion he appeared: the dwelling of the righteous.

cells.enPhonics1: El-tase qal anha: yazhar Haqan menha: al-Elah wa howa ebnaha: wal-bokooreya fi Hefzen wa waqar: El-watar el-asher: Allah el-qader: fi Sehioun zaher: maskan el-abrar.

cells.arabic: التَّاسِع  قَال  عَنهَا :  يَظْهَر  حَقَا  مِنهَا :  الْإلَه  وهُو  إبنها :  وَالْبُكُورِيَّةُ  فِي  حفط  وَوَقَار :  الْوَتَر  الْعَاشِر :  الله  الْقَادِر :  فِي  صهيون  ظَاهِر :  مَسْكَن  الْأَبْرَار

cells.english: There isn’t in all ages: anyone like you O Virgin: for you released the chains: and shame of Adam: O Lady of the creation: the pride of faith: your servant is in need: drowning because of sins.

cells.enPhonics1: Lam yowgad fi el-dahr: methlek ayatoha el-bekr, : leanek fakakty el-asr: an Adam wal-ar: ya sayedet el-akwan: ya fakhr el-eiman: ana abdek Hayran: gharek fil-awzar.

cells.arabic: لَم  يُوجِد  فِي  الدَّهْر :  مِثْلكَ  أَيَّتهَا  الْبِكْر :  لأَنّكَ  فَكَّكَت  الاسر :  عَن  آدَم  وَالْعَار :  يَا  سَيِّدَة  الْأَكْوَان :  يَا  فَخْر  الْإيمَان :  عَبَّدكَ  حِيرَان :  غَارِق  فِي  الاوزار

cells.english: Intercede for me: do not leave your servant: Ask your son to save me: From the fire: For your intercession: is heard and accepted: and He defends from the attacks: of the adversary.

cells.enPhonics1: Alen howa qadrek: la tatroky abdek: qasdy men waladek: Toba wa esteghfar: Wel adra tashfa: Fe elodar agma: We heia ana tadfa: darabat el-ashrar.

cells.arabic: عَالِيٌّ  هُو  قَدَّركَ :  لَا  تَتْرُكِي  عَبَّدكَ :  قَصْدِيٌّ  مِن  وَلَدكَ :  تَوْبَة  و  أستغفار :  و  الْعَذْرَاء  تَشْفَع :  فِي  الْحُضَّار  اِجْمَع :  و  هِي  عَنَا  تَدْفَع :  ضَرْبَات  الاشرار

cells.english: Arise O poor one, and clothe yourself in faith: and say Amen Amen: for us she intercedes: The persistent servant: Will always praise her: For by his side that Day: The Lady of virgins shall be. ${cross}

cells.enPhonics1: Qom enhad ya meskeen: wa elbes thob el-yaqeen, : wa qol amin amin: fa heya tashfa fil-Hodar: wal-nazem el-meskeen: madeHha fi kol Hin: maloh yom el-din: sewa sayedet el-abkar. ${cross}

cells.arabic: قُم  وَاِنْهَض  يَا  مِسْكِين :  وَاِلْبَس  ثَوْب  الْيَقِين :  وَقُل  امين  امين :  فهِي  تَشْفَع  فِي  الْحَاضِرِينَ :  و  أَنَا  الْخَاطِيُّ  الْمِسْكِين :  مَادِحهَا  فِي  كُلّ  حِين :  مَالِيّ  يَوْم  الدِّين :  سَوِيّ  سَيِّدَة  الابكار ${cross}

english_title: O Daughter of David - Praise on Teoi-enhikanos
arabic_title: يا ابنة داود - مدح على تيؤي انهيكانوس

cells.english: O daughter of David: The seed of the righteous: O Jewel inflamed: with The Mighty’s divinity

cells.arabic: يَا  اِبْنَة  دَاوُدٌ   مِن  نَسْل  الْأَبْرَار   يَا  جَوْهَر  مَوْقُودٌ   بِلَاَهُوت  الْجَبَّار

cells.english: He was ever-present: From the beginning of ages: Appeared born of you: With described humanity

cells.arabic: كَم  مِن  كَان  مَوْجُود   مِن  قَدَّم  الأدهار   ظُهْر  مِنكَ  مَوْلُود   بِنَاسُوتٍ  مَوْصُوف

cells.english: O door of grace: And key of paradise: O mother of the Mercy: And mother of the Holy

cells.arabic: يَا  بَاب  النَّعَمَة   وَمِفْتَاح  الْفِرْدَوْس   يَا  أَم  الرَّحْمَة   وَيَا  أَم  الْقُدُّوس

cells.english: Through the dwelling of the Word: In your womb, Agios: We gained mercy: And fear left us.

cells.arabic: بِحَوْل  الْكَلِمَة   فِي  احشاك  أجيوس   فُزْنَا  بِالرَّحْمَة   وَزَالٌ  عَنَا  الخوفى

cells.english: O Arc of the covenant: And the tablets of the Torah: With the fingers of the Lord of glory: Placed within it.

cells.arabic: يَا  تَابُوت  الْعَهْد   وَأَلْوَاح  التَّوْرَاة   بِأُصْبُع  رُبّ  الْمَجْد   مَوْضُوعَة  جَوَّاهُ

cells.english: To Him the ranks worship: And cry out in all tongues: Appeared of you in flesh: Perfect and described

cells.arabic: لَه  الطُّغْمَات  تَسْجُد   وَتَصِيح  بكُلّ  لُغَات   ظُهْر  مِنكَ  بِجَسَد   كَامِل  موصوفى

cells.english: O hidden jewel: O light of all lights: With the kept secret: In the knowledge of the Mighty

cells.arabic: يَا  جَوْهَر  مَكْنُون   يَا  ضَوْء  الْأَنْوَار   بِالسِّرّ  الْمَخْزُون   فِي  عِلْم  الْجَبَّار

cells.english: All the heavenly: Worship Him in awe: Humanity attained: Seeing Him revealed

cells.arabic: كُلّ  الْعَلَوِيِّينَ   تَسْجُد  لَه  بِوَقَار   فَاز  الْبَشَرِيُّونَ   بِنَظَرَة  مَكْشُوفِيٌّ

cells.english: O vessel of the Ember (aroma): With sweet aroma: O tree with branches: O joy of creation

cells.arabic: يَا  حَقّ  الْعَنْبَر   بِرَوَائِح  عِطْرِيَّة   يَا  شَجَرَة  بِأَغْصَان   يَا  فَرُح  الْبَرِّيَّة

cells.english: The Lord appeared of you: And you’re a maiden virgin: You bore Him as a boy: In perfect description

cells.arabic: مِنكَ  الرَّبّ  ظُهْر   وَاُنْت  بَتُول  عَذْرَاء   ولدتيه  شِبْه  وَلَد   كَامِل  مَوْصُوفِيٌّ

cells.english: O Holy chamber: Of the Spirit of God the Judge: O throne, on it sat: The creator of all the world

cells.arabic: يَا  خَدَر  مُقَدَّس   لِرَوَّح  الله  الدَّيَّان   يَا  عَرْش  وَجَلَس   عَلَيْهُ  مَنْشِيٌّ  الْأَكْوَان

cells.english: To Him, (they) worship and sanctify: And cry out in all tongues: Ⲛⲓⲧⲁⲅⲙⲁ ⲛ̀ⲛⲓⲁⲅⲅⲉⲗⲟⲥ: Thousands and myriads

cells.arabic: لَه  تَسْجُد  وَتَقَدُّس   وَتَصِيح  بكُلّ  لِسَان  Ⲛⲓⲧⲁⲅⲙⲁ ⲛ̀ⲛⲓⲁⲅⲅⲉⲗⲟⲥ:  رَبْوَات  وَالْوَفِيّ

cells.english: O full moon: At the fullness of its form: Your light surpassed the dawn: At the shining of the sun

cells.arabic: يَا  دَوَرَان  الْبَدْر   عِنْد  كَمَال  طَقْسهُ   نَوَّركَ  فَاق  الْفَجْر   بَعْد  اِشْرَق  شَمَّسهُ

cells.english: And Jesus raised your honor: With the dwelling of His Holy Spirit: In your womb, he came in triumph: To His own people

cells.arabic: وَيَسُوع  زَادكَ  قَدْر   بِحُلُول  رَوَّح  قَدَّسهُ   فِي  احشاك  اتانا  بِالنَّصْر   لِشَعَّبهُ  الْمَعْرُوفِيُّ

cells.english: O vision and prophecy: Saw it Ⲙⲱⲏ̀ⲥⲓⲥ: A bush enflamed with fire: No harm came upon it

cells.arabic: يَا  رُؤْيَا  وأنذار   عَايَنهَا Ⲙⲱⲏ̀ⲥⲓⲥ:  عَوْسَج  فِي  قَلَبهُ  نَار   ولَم  يَمَسّهُ  بَأس

cells.english: Like the adornment of all virgins: Carried the Messiah: Divinity as a live coal: United with humanity

cells.arabic: كمِثْل  زَيَّن  الْأَبْكَار   حَمَلَت  ماسياس   لَاَهُوت  كَجَمْر  النَّار   بِالنَّاسُوتِ  ملحوفي

cells.english: O fruitful plant: With out seed or water: In a pure field: Filled with fruit

cells.arabic: يازرعا  زَاهِر   مِن  غَيْر  مَاء  وَبُذَّار   فِي  حَقْل  طَاهِر   مَحْمَل  بِالْأَثْمَار

cells.english: In your womb appeared: Our Lord, the Almighty One: Able God: Merciful and Compassionate

cells.arabic: صَار  فِي  احشاك   ظَاهِر  سَيِّدنَا  الْجَبَّار   إلَه  وَاحِد  قَادِر   متحنن  وَرَؤُوفِيٌّ

cells.english: O hidden secret: In the light of lights: O mount of Zion: The Lord chose you

cells.arabic: يَا  سِرّ  مَكْنُون   فِي  نُور  الْأَنْوَار   يَا  عَلِيَّة  صهيون   إِلَيْكَ  الرَّبّ  اِخْتَار

cells.english: Your Son released the captive: From the deceiver’s bonds: After he was in debt: He became fulfilled and free

cells.arabic: إبنك  فَكّ  الْمَسْجُون   مِن  قِيد  الْمَكَّار   بَعْد  أَنّ  كَان  مَدْيُون   صَار  خَالِص  مُوَفِّي

cells.english: O honor placed upon: The head of the righteous: Your name became raised: And increased in honor

cells.arabic: يَا  شَرَّفَا  مَوْضُوع   فَوْق  رَأْس  الْأَبْرَار   أَسْمكَ  صَار  مَرْفُوع   وَزَايَد  فِي  الْمِقْدَار

cells.english: You carried the Lord Jesus: His light shone openly: And released those who were: Placed in darkness

cells.arabic: حَمْلَتي  الرَّبّ  يَسُوع   وَأَشْرَق  نَوَّرهُ  أَجِهَار   وَعِتْق  مِن  كَان   فِي  الظُّلْمَة  محدوفي

cells.english: O truth of faith: And knowledge of the Trinity: Their light would not be seen: Without your Son

cells.arabic: يَا  صَدَّق  الْإيمَان   وَمَعْرِفَة  الثَّالُوث   لَوْلَا  أَبَنْك  مَا  كَان   ظُهور  نُور  الثَّالُوث
